sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>wm_task</collection> <condition>current.state==1 && current.has_appointment</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="wm_task">dispatch_groupISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="dispatch_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Auto dispatch if wo task has appointment</name> <order>5000</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[// auto-dispatch the work order var wmTask = new GlideRecord("wm_task"); wmTask.get(current.sys_id);
var sm = new sn_sm.SMConfiguration(); if (!sm.isEnabled(wmTask, "qualification", false) && !sm.isEnabled(wmTask, "approval", false)) new global.StateFlow().processFlow(wmTask, '31d01410c340310081d7dccdf3d3aeb4', 'manual'); else new global.StateFlow().processFlow(wmTask, 'a8ae22a0d7630100fceaa6859e610377', 'manual');]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-06-27 00:17:46</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0262406ad7e33200811300285e610363</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>44</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Auto dispatch if wo task has appointment</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Field Service Management" source="com.snc.work_management">b66bd6bb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d4387</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0262406ad7e33200811300285e610363</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-11-21 06:47:43</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0262406ad7e33200811300285e610363"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Auto dispatch if wo task has appointment
